remarks: Lemma for strong set of CH states theorem: the function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a state.  This lemma restates the hypotheses in a more convenient form to work with.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hstrlem3.1 $e |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) $.
hstrlem3.2 $e |- ( ph <-> ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) ) $.
hstrlem3.3 $e |- A e. CH $.
hstrlem3.4 $e |- B e. CH $.
hstrlem3 $p |- ( ph -> S e. CHStates ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
$d u x $.
